radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate centrilobular emphysema but no residual thymic tissue, masses, or lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in the size of the precarinal and right hilar lymph nodes.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormal, nonenhancing, bright signal along both hippocampi on T2-weighted images.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistent changes consistent with limbic encephalitis but no signs of metastasis.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Right precarinal lymph node, 1.9 cm in diameter, and right hilar lymph node, 1 cm in diameter, with hypermetabolic activity noted.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A focus of hypermetabolic activity in the medial left temporal lobe of the brain.
